Articles.Content:
hi! i am starting a ksp fan story that is like super kolonization but i dont know where to go for the first interplanetary voyage. plz vote! P.S. personally i voted sarnus

Edited May 28, 2018 by EndTraveler
I am unfamiliar with these mod planets. I'd vote Duna if it was an option. Easy to get to and scenic.

You can't get more super at kolonization than Eve, since it's nearly impossible to get back.

I thought Sarnus was a gas giant?

Never liked Moho, but could be interesting if it involves kerbals going insane at the moholes.

I'm not familiar with any of the others.

I like Dres.
for the gas planets i meant to say the entire SYSTEM.
vote update: count vanamonde as voted 1 for duna

I have a base on Slate.

I never get tired of the view of Sarnus filling the sky.

Love this game.

MM

look, we need a tie breaker between the sarnus system and moho.

 

which is why i am postponing the closing time.

 

EDIT: realized it was accidentally on pm while it was meant to be on am

Edited May 28, 2018 by EndTraveler

alright, we have a tie breaker. honestly i was hoping for sarnus but...

 

eh, the mothership can collect karborundum in the sun's atmosphere...

Edited May 28, 2018 by EndTraveler
